annotations.description: Celebrating one of my favorite movies: James Cagney in The Public Enemy (1931) with a great brunch grapefruit cocktail, you dirty rat! **********************...
annotations.title: Cagney's Breakfast | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Grapefruit Juice
~ Half a Teaspoon fresh grated ginger
2 Barspoons Cholula Hot Sauce
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Simple Syrup
15-20 mint leaves
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Irish Whiskey

muddle
shake over ice
double strain
top with seltzer
Garnish with Salted Grapefruit

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mVQ0jGuDzBE
title: Cagney's Breakfast
